DOC.brief_summary: This is an epidemiological, non-interventional, prospective study to collect data on glaucoma progression in a routine setting. Patients may receive treatment at the discretion of their physician per local standard of care.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Rate of Progression of Glaucoma During a Follow-up Period of Two Years
DOC.criteria: Glaucoma in one or both eyes Participation in a glaucoma therapeutic clinical trial
